member.name: T:eHandbook.api.EndPoints.ManualEndPoints
member.summary: My EndPoints definitions for ManualManagement, using Minimal APIs approach. Used to create lightweight services that expose functionalities to clients. They'll handle incoming HTTP requests and process them to perform specific tasks, such as retrieving data, manipulating data, or performing some business logic. These APIs essentially represent a service layer responsible for handling external requests and providing responses.
